JobFullDesc: About the Role Uber AI’s mission is to optimize and innovate Uber’s products and business using machine learning and AI. The group consists of Uber's machine learning platform team which enables machine learning at scale, AI building blocks which enable product teams to build unique experiences and engagements with product teams on their business problems. About the Team The Uber AI Platform team is responsible for building cutting edge machine learning platform for various Uber services. This sub team owns machine learning orchestration services that manages thousands machine learning models in production and many data pipelines which ETL and monitor the data used for these models.
